isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - Cylinder Head Assembly - Install Oil and Fuel Rail Plugs

svcproc.title: Install Oil and Fuel Rail Plugs

caution.para: To prevent engine damage, do not apply sealant to threads of the oil drain plugs.

figure.caption: High Pressure Oil Rail Drain Plug

calloutgroup.callout1: Oil Rail Drain Plug (two per head)

step1.para: Apply clean engine oil to a new O-ring for each of the oil rail drain plugs (two per head).
Apply Loctite® #262 onto the threads of the oil rail drain plugs. Install the oil rail drain plugs into the cylinder head ports. Tighten the oil rail drain plugs to the special torque value.
Apply clean oil to a new O-ring for both of the fuel rail drain plugs.
Install the two fuel rail drain plugs into the cylinder head ports. Tighten the fuel rail drain plugs to the special torque value.

figure.caption: New and Old Style Oil Rail End Plug

calloutgroup.callout1: New Style Oil Rail End Plug With ID Groove
Old Style Oil Rail End Plug Without ID Groove

step1.para: Check the plug for an identification groove. New style plugs feature an identification groove. If the plug is of an older type, replace it with a new plug with an identification groove.

calloutgroup.callout1: Oil Rail End Plug (two per head)

step1.para: Remove the two oil rail end plugs. One is located on each end of the cylinder head. Plug the holes to prevent possible contamination.
Use a clean dry cloth and brake cleaner to clean the cylinder head internal threads. Dry the threads before installing the plug.

caution.para: Make sure the threads of the oil rail end plugs are free of any oily residue. Failure to do so may result in engine damage.

step1.para: Apply clean engine oil to the seals. Install the seals onto the oil rail end plugs without getting oil on the clean threads.
Apply a small bead of Loctite® #277 around the threads of the oil rail end plugs. Install the plugs. Tighten the plugs to the special torque value.

note.para: Before engine operation, wait at least one hour for the Loctite to cure.

step1.para: Install new O-rings on the three oil gallery plugs.

Apply Loctite® #262 onto the threads of the three oil gallery plugs and the one high pressure oil supply fitting. Install the plugs and fitting into the oil gallery ports located above each of the fuel injector bores. Tighten the plugs and fitting to the special torque value.
